mapper.select: select member_id,member_pwd,member_name,member_nick,member_birth,member_zipcode,member_addr ,member_phone,member_email from member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pwd = #{member_pwd}
select member_no,member_id,member_name,member_nick,member_point,member_level,member_join_date from member order by member_no
